This app can only be shared with approved testers.
This app release may contain bugs, and some features may be unstable.
Record all the sounds around you with one tap, be it an interview or your instrument playing.
You seem to have accessed a internal menu on a public version of Sound Recorder. Return to the home screen?
Are you sure you want to continue? Select the experimental view you want to access.
Give a name for your recording. You can always change this later.
Recorder by EZ Code could not record. This is most probably because you denied the permissions required to make recordings.

Help out the developers behind Sound Recorder by being the first to test new features and identify issues. These releases may contain bugs, but it allows for development of the application to continue at a faster pace.
Sound Recorder by EZ Code needs permission to use your microphone and permission to save files on your device to continue. Please allow these permissions.
Sound Recorder by EZ Code needs permission to save recordings to your device to continue. Please allow this permission.
There was a problem in the code and we couldn\'t clear the cache. Try again?
Tap the microphone button to start recording
Tap the settings icon to change the quality of recordings and more.
If enabled, recordings will take up more space on your device, but will sound clearer on playback.
When recording, display a notification with \"pause\" and \"stop\" actions for easy access.
You are already enrolled in the beta programme, no need.
You are already enrolled in the internal dogfood programme, no need.
You are a developer of this application, no need.
Delete all of Sound Recorder\'s temporary files to free up space on your phone and speed it up.
Tap the 3 vertical dots to see more options
What are the permissions needed for?

Sound Recorder needs access to your storage, media and files in order to be able to store the recordings on your device. The \'record audio\' permissions is required to capture audio from your microphone to record sound. Although Sound Recorder has access to sensitive data on your device, EZ Code will never share this data with other companies or even EZ Code employees.
How do I leave feedback for this application?

From the main window, press the overflow button, which looks like 3 dots stacked vertically, in the top right corner. Then press \'Give feedback\'. Enter your issue and any other additional information and tap \'send\'
Welcome to Recorder, a simple, intuitive and fluid application for recording all the sounds around you.
